content: ***about this pattern*** crochet your own wow chunky vest using this crochet pattern in pdf format this pattern contains written instructions in english and uses us crochet terminology available as an instant download the sizes are xs s m l xl 2x 3x 4x 5x measurements in inch to fit bust 28-30 32-34 36-38 40-42 44-46 48-50 52-54 56-58 60-62 bust 30 34 38 42 46 50 54 58 62 width 15 17 19 21 23 25 27 29 31 length 21 21 21 21 21 22 22 22 22 arm hole 8 9 9 10 10 11 11 12 12 measurements in cm to fit size 28-30 32-34 36-38 40-42 44-46 48-50 52-54 56-58 60-62 bust 76 86 97 107 117 127 137 147 157 cm width 38 43 48 53 58 64 69 74 79 cm length 53 53 53 53 53 56 56 56 56 cm arm hole 20 23 23 25 25 28 28 30 30 cm the printable pdf has a total of 18 pages including - written pattern in us terms - photos - schematic for the measurements - graph for all sizes - video tutorial on youtube available as an instant download --- ***questions & returns*** there are no returns on digital files please contact me if you have questions about the pattern --- ***please note *** please note that this is an ad-free and special formatted pdf version of my free crochet pattern that can be found on my blog by purchasing this pattern you support me in making more free patterns you can find the free version here https //wilmade com/wow-chunky-vest/ --- ***find me on social media*** patterns https //wilmade com instagram https //instagram com/wilmawestenberg facebook https //www facebook com/bywilmade/ pinterest https //pinterest com/wilmawestenberg youtube https //www youtube com/c/wilmawestenberg #sizeinclusive
